question: Transport Subsidy Scheme was recently in news. Consider the following statements about TSS. 1. GoI had introduced Transport Subsidy Scheme to develop industrialization in the remote and inaccessible areas. 2. It was introduced in 1991. 3. Implementing agency of TSS is Department of Industrial Policy and Promotion. Which of the following given codes is true regarding the TSS?
explanation: Government of India had introduced Transport Subsidy Scheme on 23 July,1971.The main aim was to develop industrialization in the remote, hilly and inaccessible areas. Its implementing agency was Department of Industrial Policy and Promotion.
